metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27022 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in bolt-server and ace where running a task withsensitive parameters results in those sensitive parameters being loggedwhen they should not be. This issue only affects SSH/WinRM nodes (inventoryservice nodes).

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
